title: Chapter 950 - Putting On The Airs Of A Senior
body:
Chapter 950 - Putting On The Airs Of A Senior

The Sea of Bitterness was most dangerous at night.

Ordinarily speaking, even Emperors dared not venture out to sea under the cover of darkness.

Yet now, a battle of Emperors raged on the open ocean!

And they’d obviously been at it for quite some time!

Were that all, it wouldn’t have been enough to surprise Su Yi.

Because on the Sea of Bitterness, there was no order to speak of. Combat and slaughter were commonplace, and they weren't limited to simple struggles over good fortune.

Grudges, robbery, backstabbing—all manner of brutal scenes played out here.

It was no exaggeration to say that even if an inheritor of a peak orthodoxy died here, their faction had little hope of discovering the killer.

That aside, throughout its history, the Netherworld’s heretics and demonic cultivators had viewed the Sea of Bitterness as a blessed ground for cultivation.

Because in this boundless stretch of ocean, there was no need to worry about offending anyone. In a confrontation, the stronger party survived.

What truly surprised Su Yi were the two combatants. The purple-robed man manipulating fire and lightning was in the mid-stage Profound Serenity Realm. Furthermore, Su Yi...
original_title: Chapter 950 - Putting on the Airs of a Senior
